game.name: Idlemon
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Adjustable Text Size, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 화면 옆에서 몬스터 트레이너가 되어 보세요. 훈련을 통해 경험치를 얻고 레벨을 올리며 능력치를 향상시키세요. 다른 몬스터와 싸우고 새로운 동료를 잡아보세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Idlemon is an idle desktop monster trainer. Played on the side of your screen, your monsters will gain experience, level up and grow stronger. Fight other monsters, get gold, buy items, and acquire new training buddies.
